definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

sentences.english: Without experiences in mind, he pledged he would never let his own two-year old son face such difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 他发誓不会让自己两岁的儿子生活得那么艰辛。

sentences.english: This is what I like to call the “hard work” model.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我喜欢叫做“艰辛工作”的工作模式。

sentences.english: Perhaps that's because the premolars were doing all the hard work, he suggests.
sentences.chinese: 他建议道，也许那是因为前磨牙做着所有艰辛的工作。

sentences.english: Life was hard enough already without four extra mouths to feed.
sentences.chinese: 生活已经足够艰辛，要再多喂四张嘴也是勉为其难。

sentences.english: Grumeti River is the only source of water on their long and tough journey.
sentences.chinese: 在这艰辛的长途跋涉中，格鲁美地河是唯一的水源。

sentences.english: After much hardship, the hero of the novel finally achieved the success that he so well deserved.
sentences.chinese: 主人公体尝过无数艰辛之后终于取得了成功。

sentences.english: He was determined to use music to tell the hard life of toiling masses.
sentences.chinese: 他决心用音乐来诉说劳苦大众的生活的艰辛。

sentences.english: Love that matures through hardships is the most passionate love.
sentences.chinese: 历尽艰辛而成熟的爱情是最热烈的爱情。

sentences.english: The revolutionary army had a hard time of it when they captured the city.
sentences.chinese: 革命军占领该城市时历尽了艰辛。

sentences.english: It reminds me of mountain skiing.
sentences.chinese: 这让我有种高山滑雪的艰辛感。

sentences.english: As a woman I, mysclf know and feel deeply in my heart that success is hard-earned, and it pays to work hard.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个女人，我深感成功的艰难和付出的艰辛。

sentences.english: and it was a very very tough period.
sentences.chinese: 那段时间真是异常艰辛。

sentences.english: We experienced great difficulty in taming tigers.
sentences.chinese: 我们在驯服老虎的过程中历尽艰辛。

sentences.english: But one of his successors in the White House had about as checkered a youth as can be imagined.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在白宫他的一位接班人青年时代却历尽艰辛。

sentences.english: But the road back is also tough.
sentences.chinese: 而回归之路也是十分艰辛的。

sentences.english: I was beaten out by the long and difficult journey.
sentences.chinese: 长途艰辛跋涉使我困顿不堪。

definition: exhausting/hard/tough/arduous/to work hard/to go to a lot of trouble/hardship(s)
bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life
